projects.title: Crispy VGA
projects.author: James Meech
projects.description: The scrolling VGA example from the vga playground but as you set more inputs high it gets successively more crispy

pinout.uio[0]: Crispy input bit 0 that toggles the noise on the hsync signal on or off. Also adds one bit of noise to audio.
pinout.uio[1]: Crispy input bit 1 toggles the noise on the B signal on or off. Also adds one bit of noise to audio.
pinout.uio[2]: Crispy input bit 2 toggles the noise on the G signal on or off. Also adds one bit of noise to audio.
pinout.uio[3]: Crispy input bit 3 toggles the noise on the R signal on or off. Also adds one bit of noise to audio.
pinout.uio[4]: Crispy input bit 4 that toggles the noise on the vsync signal on or off. Also adds one bit of noise to audio.
pinout.uio[5]: Crispy input bit 5 that sets the noise level applied to the R, G, and B wires to high or low. Also adds one bit of noise to audio.

pinout.ui[4]: csr_addr_in[0]: Address input for PLL control registers

pinout.uio[0]: clk_csr: Clock input for PLL control registers
